resources:
THETA (Device Web API Plug-in) THETA (Device Web API Plug-in) Booting up sample application... THETA S THETA m15 THETA
[1/4] Overview Set the WiFi connection with THETA.
Please select the type of THETA for connection. THETA [2/4] Still image mode When you press the power button on the THETA, it starts in photo mode. 

When the power is turned ON, the power button on the side will light up in blue. 

It is not possible to shoot videos in this state. If you want to shoot video, you have to turn off the power and perform the following steps. When you want to shoot still images in THETA S, please repeat the pressing of the shooting mode button until the lamp is illuminated like a the above figure. 

If you want to shoot the videos, please see the following page. [3/4] Video mode When you press the power button while pressing the WiFi button, THETA will start in movie mode. 

When the power is turned ON, the power button on the side will blink blue. 

It is not possible to shoot photos in this state. If you want to shoot a photo, you have to turn off the power and perform the previous steps." When you want to shoot videos in THETA S, please repeat the pressing of the shooting mode button until the lamp is illuminated like a the above figure. 

If you want to shoot still images, please see the previous page. [4/4] Connection with THETA Enable the WiFi in WiFi setting screen of Device, and then select the SSID of THETA.

And then, please enter the model number on the bottom of the THETA as the password. [4/4] Connection check Please press the camera search button displayed below. Searching Camera Wi-Fi Connection Check THETA can not be found. Connected to the $NAME$. 
Press the back key or the upper left corner of the screen, please close the setting screen. Open the WiFi settings screen Password entering dialog Connecting with THETA Camera... Turn ON the Wi-Fi function. Is it OK? OK Cancel Please connect with THETA Still images and videos are not saved. Not connected with THETA. Reconnect on the Settings screen Open the settings screen Saved the screen shot. Delete the selected $NAME$. Is it OK? Deleted. Shot. Update Loading... Connecting... Switching... Shooting... Saving... Preparing to start... Shooting stopped... Communication error Application Imported the data of THETA.
Import
Delete
Still image
Movie
Disconnected with THETA. Please connect with THETA on the setting screen of THETA device plug-in. Failed to communicate with THETA. After turned off the WiFi on setting screen once, please reconnect with THETA." Timeout was occurred during communication with the THETA. Video playback is not supported. Please playing with THETA official app for the PC. Failed to delete the media file. THETA m15 does not support the remote operation of the shooting mode. Please change directly in the actual equipment of the button. Failed to shoot because the storage capacity of THETA is not enough. Failed to shoot because the storage capacity of Android device is not enough. Failed to import the data because the storage capacity of Android device is not enough. Failed to save the data because of unknown error. Cannot be displayed the still image because the file size is too large. Ended shooting the movie because the enable shooting time has been reached. Failed to shoot. Failed to start to shoot a movie. Failed to stop to shoot a movie. Failed to change the mode. Failed to change the mode. Cannot shoot during live streaming. Connection timed out. Please confirm the entered password. Failed to import the THETA data. Failed to get a permission
